name: Earth Golem @Ignister
desc:
1 Cyberse monster + 1 Link Monster
You take no damage for the rest of the turn after this was Fusion Summoned. If this card attacks a monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, it gains ATK equal to its original ATK during the Damage Step. When this card is destroyed by battle: You can target 1 Cyberse monster in your GY, except “Earth Golem @Ignister”; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Earth Golem @Ignister" once per turn.
